type.description: The type of the event, always `response.reasoning.done`.

sequence_number.description: The sequence number of the event that was emitted.

item_id.description: The ID of the item that was updated.

output_index.description: The index of the output item that was updated.

content_index.description: The index of the reasoning content that was completed.

text.description: The final reasoning text that was emitted.

title: Response reasoning done event
description: A streaming event that indicated reasoning text was completed.
